Class SyncTime

  Activity
      edu.uml.cs.isense.sync.SyncTime

public class SyncTime
extends Activity

Allows the user to share his device's current time with other devices on the same network.

Method Detail

onCreate

Creates the 4 button layout that can send and receive time. It also
 allows the user to reset his iSENSE uploading time stamp back to its
 default.
